name: Dizzy 3 and a Half
overview: A short demonstration of Magicland Dizzy that explains how Dizzy found his way to Magicland. It consists of a series of five screens (and one non-interactive screen). The objective is to repair the broken generator for the teleportation machine. Only a few items and one NPC are available. Released on the Crash Magazine issue 84: Presents 20 Covertape.
